full_text: APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301 Expiration Date: 8/31/66 1150 PART A - STATEMENT OF QUALIFICATIONS OF ALIEN (ES-575A) IDENTIFYING AND PERSONAL DATA 1. (Family name in capital letters) (First name) (Middle name) (Maiden name, if alien is a married woman) NAME OF ALIEN LO Yung Sing 2. ALIEN'S BIRTHDATE 3. BIRTHPLACE (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) 4. PRESENT NATIONALITY OR CITI- ZENSHIP 25th Dec. 1910 Kiukiang Kiangsi China Chinese 5. PRESENT ADDRESS (Number and Street) (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) Flat C, 16th Floor, Hing Cheong Building, Shaukiwan Road, Hongkong B.C.C. 6. ADDRESS IN UNITED STATES WHERE ALIEN WILL RESIDE 1312Ridgecrest Drive Beverly Hills, California D. K. Ludwig 860 7. KIND OF WORK ALIEN IS SEEKING 8. IF ALIEN IS SEEKING CHANGE OF CLASSIFICATION GIVE TYPE OF VISA NOW HELD Cook N/A 9. EDUCATION AND TRAINING DEGREES OR NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF SCHOOLS, COLLEGES OR UNIVERSITIES FIELD OF STUDY FROM TO CERTIFICATES RECEIVED Tung Man Primary School- Kiukiang, Kiangsi, China 1920 1923 OAST SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS 10. DESCRIBE SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS POSSESSED (List any certificates or licenses that give evidence of alien's abilities. For example, as re- quired for employment in occupations such as architect, engineer, lawyer, physician, surgeon, teacher). Nil 11. DESCRIBE ANY SPECIAL SKILLS ALIEN POSSESSES AND PROFICIENCY IN THE USE OF TOOLS, MACHINES OR EQUIPMENT. Nil 12. GIVE ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CONCERNING ALIEN NOT GIVEN ELSEWHERE WHICH WOULD HELP ESTABLISH ALIEN'S QUALIFI- CATIONS. 4 years service as a cook and 25 years service as a No. 1 houseboy. 13. LIST DOCUMENTS ATTACHED WHICH ARE SUBMITTED AS EVIDENCE THAT ALIEN POSSESSES THE EDUCATION, TRAINING, EXPERIENCE AND ABILITIES REPRESENTED. Mr. E.B. Moller - Mollers' Limited, H.K. ; 4 references - T.A. Hoyland of British Consulate General, Shanghai, Kiangsu;ans HongKong. Mr.C. De. Bedior- Hongkong. (MAKE NO ENTRY IN THIS SECTION - FOR DEPARTMENT USE ONLY) 3 (SEE OVER)
